languages.text: "Варп-активность аномальна, мир гибнет. Вигдис, вытаскивайте Вольного Торговца, срочно! Я принимаю командование кораблем до {mf|его|ее} возвращения".
"This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."
languages.original_text: "Варп-активность аномальна, мир гибнет. Вигдис, вытаскивайте Вольного Торговца, срочно! Я принимаю командование кораблем до {mf|его|ее} возвращения".

traits.locale_text: "The warp activity is anomalous, this world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of here right now! I assume the command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."
"The warp activity is anomalous, this world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of here right now! I assume the command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."
"This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."
"This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."
"This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."

languages.text: « L'activité du Warp est anormale, cette planète se meurt. Vigdis, évacuez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} immédiatement ! Je prendrai le commandement du vaisseau jusqu'à son retour. »
languages.original_text: "This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."

traits.locale_text: « L'activité du Warp est anormale, cette planète se meurt. Vigdis, évacuez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} immédiatement ! Je prendrai le commandement du vaisseau jusqu'à son retour. »

languages.text: "Diese Warpaktivität ist anormal, diese Welt stirbt. Vigdis, schafft {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} da weg, sofort! Ich übernehme bis zu {mf|seiner|ihrer} Rückkehr das Kommando über das Raumschiff."
languages.original_text: "This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Warpaktivität ist anormal, diese Welt stirbt. Vigdis, schafft {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} da weg, sofort! Ich übernehme bis zu {mf|seiner|ihrer} Rückkehr das Kommando über das Raumschiff."

languages.text: «La actividad disfórmica es anómala, ese mundo está a punto de desparecer. Vigdis, ¡saque a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de ahí, ahora! Asumiré el mando de la nave del vacío hasta que vuelva».
languages.original_text: "This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."

traits.locale_text: «La actividad disfórmica es anómala, ese mundo está a punto de desparecer. Vigdis, ¡saque a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de ahí, ahora! Asumiré el mando de la nave del vacío hasta que vuelva».

languages.text: “这种亚空间活动很不正常，那个世界正在消亡。维格迪斯，马上把行商浪人弄出来！在{mf|他|她}回来之前，由我来指挥这艘虚空舰。”
languages.original_text: "This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."

traits.locale_text: “这种亚空间活动很不正常，那个世界正在消亡。维格迪斯，马上把行商浪人弄出来！在{mf|他|她}回来之前，由我来指挥这艘虚空舰。”

languages.text: 「この<歪み>の活動は異常だ。あの惑星は滅びようとしている。ヴィグディス、自由開拓者を今すぐそこから救出しろ！{mf|彼|彼女}が戻るまで俺がヴォイドシップの指揮を執る」
languages.original_text: "This warp activity is anomalous, that world is dying. Vigdis, get the Rogue Trader out of there, now! I will assume command of the voidship until {mf|he|she} returns."

traits.locale_text: 「この<歪み>の活動は異常だ。あの惑星は滅びようとしている。ヴィグディス、自由開拓者を今すぐそこから救出しろ！{mf|彼|彼女}が戻るまで俺がヴォイドシップの指揮を執る」
